CustomProperties.Name: DialogTextColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color of the text displayed on the dialog

CustomProperties.Name: DialogLoadingText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text displayed on the loading dialog

CustomProperties.Name: DialogProgressText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Progress text that is shown on the loading dialog

CustomProperties.Name: RedirectTo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: To which screen the component should redirect the user to if the property Navigate On Finished is true

CustomProperties.Name: RedirectText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The text displayed before redirecting the user if the Redirect On Finished property is true. The text value X will be replace by the amount of seconds left before redirecting if countdown is enabled

CustomProperties.Name: StartRedirect
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the redirect process should be started

CustomProperties.Name: CountdownFrom
CustomProperties.Tooltip: From which amount of seconds the countdown should start

CustomProperties.Name: DialogFontSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The font size used to display text in the dialog

CustomProperties.Name: ResetDialog
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the dialog and its elements should be reset

CustomProperties.Name: UserIsDeveloper
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Determines whether certain hidden elements should be shown

CustomProperties.Name: LoadingDialogSpinner
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Image of the spinner displayed on the loading dialog
